EmailTemplate.name: 201712_Global_Email2_GoDirect_Datalink_mih.201712_Global_Email2_GoDirect_Datalin
EmailTemplate.subject: Position Report Emails - New and Improved - GoDirect Flight Services
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Customer,
The new enhanced position reports we informed you about last week will be available starting Thursday, Dec 7. To View the details of the enhancements CLICK HERE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/GoDirectFS_PositionReportEmails_Dec17.pdf]]>.
If you are currently receiving position reports, no action is required on your part. The reports will appear in the updated format this Thursday and include the new enhancements.
If you are not receiving these reports and are interested in the new capabilities, please contact Honeywell GoDirect Flight Services at flightservices@honeywell.com <[[mailto:flightservices@honeywell.com]]>.
Honeywell GoDirect
